main.name: Margarita Wang
main.description: with a degree in Chemical Engineering and a minor in Commerce developing robust code for for a cutting-edge FinTech startup
main.bio: Experience in building full-stack web apps, familiar with JavaScript, Ruby, Matlab, C and SQL. I meditate by building virtual architectures, creating smoother user interface and solving new problems each day. A dedicated team player and a solution-oriented team leader. Kept awake by coffee, quality food, pep talks and ideas that fuel imagination.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

work.title: Software Developer
work.description:
• Built the core user interface for an award-winning security exchange platform using React and Redux and developed new user-facing features
• Mentored junior developers and onboarded team members
• Collaborated with UX designers regarding user design and ensured the technical feasibility of UI/UX designs
• Built and integrated REST APIs, bug fixes with the backend development team using Rust and Actix
• Deployed applications using Kubernetes engines, created and managed Kubernetes clusters

work.title: Application Developer
work.description:
• Created smoother user experiences in applications using Laravel, Ionic, React and designed SQL database models

• Set up unit testing with PHPUnit and Jest and React end-to-end test suites with Cypress

• Implemented coding standards, best practices, and industry standard workflows including PR reviews.

• Set up documentation practices and presented lunch and learns for team project management and soft skills development

projects.title: FriendTrip
projects.category: A trip plannning application for group travellers to schedule and coordinate together in real time

projects.title: Transit App
projects.category: (WIP) A front-end React app that pulls Translink API to render live bus locations on an interactable map.

projects.title: WikiMap
projects.category: A web app that allows users to collaboratively create maps which list multiple "points", such as "Best Places to Eat Around Town" or "Locations of Movie Scenes"

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
